CraftARTrackingContentVideo

public CraftARTrackingContentVideo(java.lang.String videoUri)
Create a CraftARTrackingContentVideo defining it's video programatically.

Parameters:
videoUri - Can be either a url (http://example.com/video.mp4) or a local uri.

CraftARTrackingContentVideo

public CraftARTrackingContentVideo(java.lang.String videoUri,
                                   boolean transparencyMask)
Create a CraftARTrackingContentVideo defining it's video programatically.

Parameters:
videoUri - Can be either a url (http://example.com/video.mp4) or a local uri.
transparencyMask - Whether the video has a transparency mask
